article: Niki Gudex ( Guildford , England  ) is an Australian professional mountain biker from Sydney. She competes in both downhill and cross country disciplines. , In addition to being a professional mountainbiker, Gudex is also a model and a graphic designer . In the Australian edition of FHM magazine she has been listed in the 100 Sexiest Women in the World in 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005 and 2006. ,
